mapper.select: select c.mno, tno, substring_index(group_concat(date order by date desc), ',', 1) as date, substring_index(group_concat(msg order by date desc), ',', 1) as msg, sum(if(confirm=0, if(whosend=tno, 1, 0), 0)) as unread, m.name, m.img as timg from chat c inner join memb m on c.tno=m.mno group by c.mno, c.tno having c.mno = #{memberno} order by c.date desc;

select c.mno, tno, substring_index(group_concat(date order by date desc), ',', 1) as date, substring_index(group_concat(msg order by date desc), ',', 1) as msg, sum(if(confirm=0, if(whosend=tno, 1, 0), 0)) as unread, m.name, m.img as timg from chat c inner join memb m on c.mno=m.mno group by c.mno, c.tno having c.tno = #{trainerno} order by c.date desc;
